name: Cat Fu
description:
Card Fu is a Rock-Paper-Scissors style game.

In Card Fu, there are 3 different card types, Attack, Defence and Guard Break cards. Attack cards beat Guard Break cards. Guard Break cards beat Defence cards. And finally, Defence cards beat Attack cards.

  • Attack -> Guard Break
  • Guard Break -> Defence
  • Defence -> Attack

To win you must do either of the following:

  1. A player wins if they are able to score 3 cards of the same card type (Attack, Defend or Guard Brake) with each card being of a different colour.
  2. OR. A player will win if they are able to score 3 cards of the same card type of which are all of different colours.
